title: Lisa M. Schuetz: How did you get started examining handwriting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for asking. I was exposed at age ten, as my family doctor knew some basic things. I've formally studied for 25 years now in European and trait stroke approach. My background in biology, research and depth psychology (graduate work) give me a breadth that aids In my abilities. Visit my websites and sign up for my free email newsletter, if interested.
